r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $861.8K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Delta Photonics. The average
  contract duration was 0.24 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $67.5K. The longest
  contract was 1.13 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $697.5K.
lookup_name: 'DELTA PHOTONICS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '861.8K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '42'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '5%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '66%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '379.6K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.24'
s421_mean_contract_value: '67.5K'
s425_max_duration: '1.13'
s422_max_contract_value: '697.5K'
